post.body: -- in Montana, not Portland, majorly exhausting when you can't sit on your ass between sets because custies want you.
oh drool. How I miss those tacos.
hahahaha. I hope you are done soon.
Natch, just after that I became busy. But yes, random crazy is good. Awesome ad for bar in PDX: "No Jaeger, No Douchebags."
think they can litigate?
http://tinyurl.com/9hs29f aw yeah, eBay has the classiest shit.
Oh my god, you're right. But it wasn't much, and at least in my part of town seems to be melting rapidly.
http://twitpic.com/x2r3 - Oh my god. Was she just, like, "Fuck it. I'll just get some more rubbers instead"?
LULZ. American Idol suing a club I worked at in Austin. http://tinyurl.com/537x5b Thanks, Casey!
Missoula-PDX flight delayed. PDX-AUS tomorrow? Cancelled. At least I know now instead of at 5 a.m. tomorrow.
Hopefully can get out of Missoula and into Portland today, then out of Portland tomorow; crazy weather.
Still in negative degrees, car still in shop.
Oh my god. It is -6, -30 wind chill, and my car wouldn't start. My mouth got so numb in the 5 minutes I was outside, I could barely speak.
Whoah. Closing an hour early on a Saturday. Serious winter weather. Driving 10 mph home.
Adrenaline rush from snowy icy 30 min/5 mile drive to work barely subsiding after two hours.
Feeling like a dork working in flats thanks to doctor's orders.
At doctor's, having told her what I do for a living: "You don't have insurance, do you?" Why yes, I do. If I was a waitress I'd be fucked.
LOLing at Gus Van Sant wearing Mary's jacket in Entourage.
being one of four on shift BLOWS. 3 hrs, 4 3-song sets down already.
I have painkillers. And a pain that has lessened. Spent 7 hrs in ER, had CAT scan, enema, woo. I'm fine, it's nothing major, but loopy now.
Being thankful and full.
Wondering if anything tonight can top seeing 20 college football players standing up around the stage singing along to "My Dick."
Any Thanksgiving orphans or UT fans in Missoula?
I fantasize about having a bunch of dancers on Twitter to follow. Mainly when I'm bored at the club.
A really cute girl just touched the small of my back and complimented my shape. Mood elevator.
Yummy Pine State. So good.
Oh hey, anyone want to buy our beanbag chair? http://portland.craigslist.org/mlt/fuo/978311981.html
Going to have biscuits at the awesome Pine State in an hour or so. It's a Portland girl brunch so PDX ladies feel free to come by.
I keep waking up at 8 a.m. Far too early.
Now that the OR smoking ban is in effect, the dressing room bathroom is the smoker's lounge. Customers get to stand outside in the rain.
An inch of snow here is less impressive considering what I might be returning to in Missoula.
Hooray; travel home was far simpler than travel out. Here in Portland the snow has melted and we're back to plain old rain.
Continental, why does it always take 45 minutes to get the bags off the damn Houston flight?
I am running out of time to eat migas. Where to get them?
Oh hooray. Out at Mom's in the country, my happy place.
Hey Austin, I'm heading to the Yellow Rose to watch football and boobs in half an hour.
Austin Hyatt always makes me remember seeing Ann Richard's victory speech here in 1990.
Want to stick my face into this bag of Guero's tacos and sniff it like a cheerleader's panties.
Merry Christmas! Leaving Portland, Part III: will ride MAX to PDX and get our asses to San Antonio tonight. Christmas dinner at Mi Tierra.
Dude at bar looking at Exotic mag: "Try to find a picture of a girl in here with eyes that look alive. Dead eyes, dead eyes, dead eyes."
